d:testDescription.p: This tests parts of the SVGStringList interface. Particularly it tests that strings that are taken from one SVGStringList and then inserted into another SVGStringList duplicates the value instead of removing the value from the first list when it's inserted into the second list.

d:operatorScript.p: Run the test. No interaction required.

d:passCriteria.p: The test has passed if there are three green rectangles visible and no red. Red is an indication that the test failed.
